articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Netflix Addresses Gabby Petito AI Voice Recreation For ‘American Murder’ - Forbes
articles.description: In American Murder: Gabby Petito, Netflix  used AI to recreate her voice to read texts and letters, sparking debate about its use.
articles.content:
Gabby Petito
Netflix
The current most popular show on Netflix is American Murder: Gabby Petito, a documentary about the murder of the 22-year-old by her fiancée Brian Laundrie in 2021. Its a unique… [+2538 chars]

articles.author: Lisa Respers France
articles.title: ‘Good American Family’ reignites interest in ‘The Curious Case of Natalia Grace’ - CNN
articles.description: The docuseries “The Curious Case of Natalia Grace” took viewers by storm, spurring sequels and now a new drama is reminding many about her story.
articles.content:
Editors Note: A version of this story was originally published in January 2024.
